<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs=""
>
[Flailtongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=3888) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

Your tongue has mutated into a lashing weapon reminiscent of [Kabriri's](/Deities.aspx?ID=76) bone-laden [flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19). You can use a free action to unhinge your lower jaw and sprout rigid bones from your tongue. You gain an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Until you use an Interact action to reset your jaw and retract your tongue, you can't make a jaws Strike. Your flailtongue is in the [flail](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=7) weapon group and has the [disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), and [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) traits.
name: Flailtongue
